page.title: 10SMITH BULMERS
page.content: {Smith Bulmers}is a factory which specialises in the production of high quality yarns. The buildings on this site were esablished{100/125}years ago the original buildings were destroyed by fire during the 1st World war.In the {1920's}new buildings were added and were equipped for worsted spinning. On{5/6/85}299 people were employed 124 of these are female and 175 are male. There are three shifts{Days, {Evenings}and{Nights. The only training schemes they operate is{Y.T.S. The raw materials come from many places but mainly from{Australia,New {Zealand}and{South Africa. Finished products go to be woven into material and to{hoiserys}to be knitted into woolen garments.
